CustomField.formula: IF ( FPSA_Sunday_Hours__c > 0 , 1 , 0 ) + IF ( FPSA_Monday_Hours__c > 0 , 1 , 0 ) + IF ( FPSA_Tuesday_Hours__c > 0 , 1 , 0 ) + IF ( FPSA_Wednesday_Hours__c > 0 , 1 , 0 ) + IF ( FPSA_Thursday_Hours__c > 0 , 1 , 0 ) + IF ( FPSA_Friday_Hours__c > 0 , 1 , 0 ) + IF ( FPSA_Saturday_Hours__c > 0 , 1 , 0 )
CustomField.label: Total Days Worked
